lead_paragraph: College students from Saudi Arabia and Kuwait have brought much-needed money to a predominantly Mormon city, but it has made for a troubled mix.

headline.print_headline: The Middle East Came to Idaho State. It Wasn’t the Best Fit.
headline.main: The Mideast Came to Idaho State. It Wasn’t the Best Fit.

snippet: College students from Saudi Arabia and Kuwait have brought much-needed money to a predominantly Mormon city, but it has made for a troubled mix.
abstract: Swelling number of Saudi and Kuwaiti students at Idaho State University is causing tensions on campus as well as within community; locals are uncomfortable with plan to build mosque nearby, and professors complain that students are ill-prepared and frequently resort to cheating; cultural clashes are leading some Middle Eastern students to leave, to dismay of school increasingly dependent on their high out-of-state tuition.
